name: Lazy Old-Fashioned
description: Here’s the easiest ever old-fashioned. No stirring. No garnishing. Just some whiskey, bitters, sugar and ice — an eternally excellent combination, even without any ritual or fuss.
recipeIngredient: 1 scant teaspoon sugar (I like brown sugar, but use what you’ve got)
A few dashes of Angostura or orange bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Put the sugar in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. Douse it with the bitters. Add ice and pour in the whiskey.
